Description: Four beads in different shapes and materials. A: Short cylindrical bead made of turquoise faience. B: Three disc-shaped beads, two made of faience, one of them broken, one bead made of white stone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2Z A', lowest level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
